reviewText: Had seen this MLB Network production.  Fine representation of this most amazing night of baseball.
Bought this for my boyfriend and he loved it! I don't know much about sports so I can only go off what he says. :) Shipping took about a week so wasn't too bad.

It met all of my expectations, and then some!  This video brought back all the excitement of that memorable night, when the eyes of the baseball world watched four teams battle for two wild card slots, and the crazy outcomes. Highly recommended viewing!

If you're a Cardinals or Rays fan you will love to have this DVD, If your a Braves or Red Sox fan not so much. September 28, 2011 will be remembered by fans as the Greatest night of Baseball. You had 2 Great Comebacks and 2 Great Collaspes. The Rays coming back from a 7-0 deficit to defeat the Yankees and Clinch the AL Wild Card is Compared to the Bufflalo Bills Comeback in the 1992 AFC Wild card game .

This film does an excellent job of capturing the excitement of one of the most memorable days in the history of our national pastime.
Jumping from game to game, the film brings back memories for fans of all ages of the evening that decided the National and American League wild cards, vaulting the Rays and eventual World Champion Cardinals into the playoffs while crushing the hopes and dreams of fans in Atlanta and Boston.
Truly fantastic summary of what must be one of the most exciting, suspenceful, nail-biting, days in the history of baseball. Well put together. Must see for all baseball fans!
